titleStmt.title: Reasons why this kingdom, as all others: and the Parliaments and people of this kingdom, as all others, whether Christian or heathen. And especially such as hould predestination ought to adhere to their kings, whether good or bad.
titleStmt.author: I. I., faithful subject to his King and welwisher to his Parliament.

notesStmt.note: At end: Collected by I. I. a faithful Subject to his King and welwisher to his Parliament, to the use of all true Protestants.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
